name: Riptide Manor (Prototype 2020 Version)
description:
To whom it may concern...

This is a first prototype for Riptide Manor, originally designed as a minimalist realtime/turn-based hybrid roguelike with mixed 2D/3D art, made in Unity.

The game currently being remade and expanded, with added deck building mechanics and depth of overall systems. Unfortunately, the interesting-but-unwieldy triangular grid had to be abandoned in favour of a simple square grid, and the semi-realtime aspect was exchanged for more conventional turn-based combat.

Made with Unity 2019.4
